1: Staff were friendly enough and the vibe relaxed but service just was not up to it for something that cost in excess of GBP50 a night
The three stars that I gave were an average of the usual 5 stars and 1 that I would have given the reservations desk and the quality of the stay this time
2: I was completely surprised this year that the reception hall has completely changed
The free by desk staff had difficulty answering my questions about the area training is a must 3
With no bar or food service in the very large lobby building it seems like wasted space and we rarely viewed people in there
Only negative for us was that there was no desk in the room for the bit of work we had to do during our stay
If you have a staff member on leave long term you need to ensure that clients are still taken care of
Pool is excellent but bring your own beverage as service passes are few and far between
Although the staff was friendly they could ’ve been a bit quicker with fixing some of the minor issues that we had
If you do n’t feel like walking the staff will take you and pick you up
